import React, { Component } from "react"; class Login extends Component { state = { email: "", password: "", name: "", emails: "", passwords: "", cpasswords: "" }; onChange = e => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; LoginSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(e.target.email); }; render() { const loginStyle = { padding: "10px", border: "5px solid #d9534f", margin: "0", backgroundColor: "#d9d6d2", boxShadow: "10px 10px 5px grey", fontFamily: "Comic Sans MS" }; return (
